mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into goods_details (goods_id, tripartite_long, tripartite_width, tripartite_height, tripartite_weight, actual_long, actual_width, actual_height, actual_weight, ship_address, ship_contact, ship_contact_mobile, receipt_address, receipt_contact, receipt_contact_mobile, shipper, warning_state, abnormal_text, add_time, update_time, admin_uid,app_user_id,good_state,payment_status,singapore_area_id,rally_point_id,category,item_value,is_arrival_pay ) values (#{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tripartiteLong,jdbcType=REAL}, #{tripartiteWidth,jdbcType=REAL}, #{tripartiteHeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{tripartiteWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{actualLong,jdbcType=REAL}, #{actualWidth,jdbcType=REAL}, #{actualHeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{actualWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{shipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipContactMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiptAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiptContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiptContactMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{warningState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abnormalText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{adminUid,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{appUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{paymentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{singaporeAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rallyPointId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{itemValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{isArrivalPay,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update goods_details set goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tripartite_long = #{tripartiteLong,jdbcType=REAL}, tripartite_width = #{tripartiteWidth,jdbcType=REAL}, tripartite_height = #{tripartiteHeight,jdbcType=REAL}, tripartite_weight = #{tripartiteWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_long = #{actualLong,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_width = #{actualWidth,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_height = #{actualHeight,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_weight = #{actualWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, ship_address = #{shipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ship_contact = #{shipContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ship_contact_mobile = #{shipContactMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_address = #{receiptAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_contact = #{receiptContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_contact_mobile = #{receiptContactMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipper = #{shipper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, warning_state = #{warningState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, abnormal_text = #{abnormalText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, admin_uid = #{adminUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, app_user_id = #{appUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, good_state = #{goodState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_status = #{paymentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_urgent = #{isUrgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_way = #{payWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_explain = #{itemExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_value = #{itemValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, singapore_area_id = #{singaporeAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rally_point_id = #{rallyPointId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where gd_id = #{gdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select gd_id,goods_id, tripartite_long, tripartite_width, tripartite_height, tripartite_weight, actual_long, actual_width, actual_height, actual_weight, ship_address, ship_contact, ship_contact_mobile, receipt_address, receipt_contact, receipt_contact_mobile,shipper, warning_state, abnormal_text, add_time, update_time, admin_uid,app_user_id,good_state,payment_status from goods_details where gd_id = #{gdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select gd_id, goods_id, tripartite_long, tripartite_width, tripartite_height, tripartite_weight, actual_long, actual_width, actual_height, actual_weight, ship_address, ship_contact, ship_contact_mobile, receipt_address, receipt_contact, receipt_contact_mobile,shipper, warning_state, abnormal_text, add_time, update_time, admin_uid,app_user_id,good_state,payment_status from goods_details

select gd_id, gd.from,gds.goods_id, tripartite_long, tripartite_width, tripartite_height, tripartite_weight, actual_long, actual_width, actual_height, actual_weight, ship_address, ship_contact, ship_contact_mobile, receipt_address, receipt_contact, receipt_contact_mobile,shipper, gds.warning_state, abnormal_text, gds.add_time, gds.update_time, gds.admin_uid,gd.zip_code,gd.good_type,gd.is_special_goods,gd.delivery_number, gd.tripartite_number,gw.deal_comment,gw.warning_type,gds.app_user_id,gds.good_state,gds.payment_status,gd.transport_type, gd.amount,gd.create_time,gd.exit_way,gds.category,gds.is_urgent,gds.pay_way,gds.item_name,gds.item_explain,gds.item_value, gd.parent_id,gds.singapore_area_id,gds.rally_point_id,gds.payment_status,gw.deal_comment,gd.total_goods,gds.is_receive_goods,gds.gst_price,gds.is_arrival_pay,gd.bag_id from goods_details AS gds LEFT JOIN goods AS gd ON (gds.goods_id=gd.goods_id) LEFT join goods_warning AS gw ON (gds.goods_id=gw.goods_id) WHERE gds.goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT gd.delivery_number as deliveryNumber ,gds.ship_contact,gds.receipt_contact,gds.ship_address,gds.receipt_address,gd.zip_code as zipCode,gd.good_type as goodsType, gd.is_special_goods as isSpecialGoods FROM goods_details AS gds LEFT JOIN goods AS gd ON (gds.goods_id=gd.goods_id) WHERE gd.bag_id = #{bagId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT count(gd.goods_id) FROM goods_details AS gds LEFT JOIN goods AS gd ON (gds.goods_id=gd.goods_id) WHERE gd.bag_id = #{bagId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT gds.gd_id,gds.goods_id,gd.from,gd.delivery_number,gd.tripartite_number,gd.good_type,gd.is_special_goods,gds.tripartite_long, gds.tripartite_width,gds.tripartite_height,gds.tripartite_weight,gds.ship_address,gds.ship_contact,gds.ship_contact_mobile, gds.receipt_address,gds.receipt_contact,gds.receipt_contact_mobile,gds.app_user_id,gds.good_state,gds.payment_status, sa.singapore_area_name,gd.exit_way FROM goods_details AS gds LEFT JOIN goods AS gd ON (gd.goods_id =gds.goods_id) LEFT JOIN singapore_area_building AS sab ON (gd.zip_code =sab.sa_zip_code) LEFT JOIN singapore_area AS sa ON (sa.singapore_area_id = sab.sa_id) WHERE gd.tripartite_number = #{tripartiteNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT gds.gd_id,gds.goods_id,gd.delivery_number,gd.tripartite_number,gd.good_type,gd.is_special_goods,gd.zip_code,gds.actual_long, gds.actual_width,gds.actual_height,gds.actual_weight,gds.ship_address,gds.ship_contact,gds.ship_contact_mobile, gds.receipt_address,gds.receipt_contact,gds.receipt_contact_mobile,gds.warning_state, gds.abnormal_text,wh.warehouse_name AS into_wh,wh2.warehouse_name AS out_wh, wp.wp_number AS into_wp,wp2.wp_number AS out_wp,gw.deal_comment,gw.warning_type,gds.app_user_id,gds.good_state, gds.payment_status,gds.item_value,gds.is_arrival_pay,gds.gst_price,gds.is_receive_goods FROM goods_details AS gds LEFT JOIN goods AS gd ON (gd.goods_id =gds.goods_id) LEFT JOIN warehouse_positions AS wp ON (gd.into_warehouse_positions_id=wp.wp_id) LEFT JOIN warehouse_positions AS wp2 ON(gd.out_warehouse_positions_id=wp2.wp_id) LEFT JOIN warehouse AS wh ON (into_warehouse_id=wh.warehouse_id) LEFT JOIN warehouse AS wh2 ON (out_warehouse_id=wh2.warehouse_id) LEFT JOIN goods_warning AS gw ON (gds.goods_id = gw.goods_id) WHERE gd.delivery_number = #{deliveryNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT gds.gd_id,gds.goods_id,gd.delivery_number,gd.good_type,gds.app_user_id,gds.good_state,gds.payment_status, gds.add_time,gds.update_time,gd.transport_type,gd.parent_id,gd.tripartite_number,gd.parent_id,gds.category FROM goods_details AS gds LEFT JOIN goods AS gd ON (gd.goods_id =gds.goods_id) WHERE gd.parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select goods_id from goods where delivery_number = #{deliveryNumber,jdbcType =VARCHAR}

SELECT gds.gd_id,gd.`status`,gds.goods_id,gd.from,gd.delivery_number,gd.tripartite_number,gd.good_type,gd.is_special_goods,gd.zip_code,gds.actual_long, gds.actual_width,gds.actual_height,gds.actual_weight,gds.ship_address,gds.ship_contact,gds.ship_contact_mobile,gd.exit_way, gds.receipt_address,gds.receipt_contact,gds.receipt_contact_mobile,gds.warning_state, gds.abnormal_text,wh.warehouse_name AS into_wh,wh2.warehouse_name AS out_wh, wp.wp_number AS into_wp,wp2.wp_number AS out_wp,gw.deal_comment,gw.warning_type,gds.app_user_id,gds.good_state,gds.payment_status,bag.bag_number, gds.singapore_area_id,gds.rally_point_id,gds.category,gds.item_value,gds.is_arrival_pay,gds.gst_price,gds.is_receive_goods,gd.status FROM goods_details AS gds LEFT JOIN goods AS gd ON (gd.goods_id =gds.goods_id) LEFT JOIN warehouse_positions AS wp ON (gd.into_warehouse_positions_id=wp.wp_id) LEFT JOIN warehouse_positions AS wp2 ON(gd.out_warehouse_positions_id=wp2.wp_id) LEFT JOIN warehouse AS wh ON (into_warehouse_id=wh.warehouse_id) LEFT JOIN warehouse AS wh2 ON (out_warehouse_id=wh2.warehouse_id) LEFT JOIN goods_warning AS gw ON (gds.goods_id = gw.goods_id) LEFT JOIN bag ON (gd.bag_id = bag.bag_id) WHERE gd.delivery_number = #{deliveryNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT gds.gd_id,gds.goods_id,gds.receipt_contact,gds.receipt_contact_mobile,gds.payment_status,gd.parent_id, gd.`from`,gd.transport_type,gd.delivery_number,gd.amount,gd.create_time,gd.zip_code,gd.add_time,gds.category,gds.good_state FROM goods_details AS gds LEFT JOIN goods AS gd ON (gds.goods_id = gd.goods_id)
gd.`from` = '转运订单' AND transport_type ='普通转运'
AND gd.delivery_number like "%"#{deliveryNumber}"%"
AND gds.receipt_contact like "%"#{receiptContact}"%"
AND gd.add_time > #{addTime}
AND gd.add_time < #{endTime}
AND gds.payment_status like "%"#{paymentStatus}"%"
AND gd.transport_type like "%"#{transportType}"%"
OR gd.`from` = '转运订单' AND transport_type ='组合转运'
AND gd.delivery_number like "%"#{deliveryNumber}"%"
AND gds.receipt_contact like "%"#{receiptContact}"%"
AND gd.add_time > #{addTime}
AND gd.add_time < #{endTime}
AND gds.payment_status like "%"#{paymentStatus}"%"
AND gd.transport_type like "%"#{transportType}"%"
ORDER BY gds.gd_id DESC

SELECT COUNT(gds.gd_id) AS count FROM goods_details AS gds LEFT JOIN goods AS gd ON (gds.goods_id = gd.goods_id)
gd.`from` = '转运订单' AND transport_type ='普通转运'
AND gd.delivery_number like "%"#{deliveryNumber}"%"
AND gds.receipt_contact like "%"#{receiptContact}"%"
AND gd.add_time > #{addTime}
AND gd.add_time < #{endTime}
AND gds.payment_status like "%"#{paymentStatus}"%"
AND gd.transport_type like "%"#{transportType}"%"
OR gd.`from` = '转运订单' AND transport_type ='组合转运'
AND gd.delivery_number like "%"#{deliveryNumber}"%"
AND gds.receipt_contact like "%"#{receiptContact}"%"
AND gd.add_time > #{addTime}
AND gd.add_time < #{endTime}
AND gds.payment_status like "%"#{paymentStatus}"%"
AND gd.transport_type like "%"#{transportType}"%"
ORDER BY gd.create_time DESC

SELECT gds.gd_id,gds.goods_id,gds.receipt_contact,gds.receipt_contact_mobile,gds.payment_status,gd.parent_id, gd.`from`,gd.transport_type,gd.delivery_number,gd.delivery_number,gd.amount,gd.create_time,gd.zip_code,gds.receipt_address, gds.pay_way,gds.gst_price,good_state,gd.warehouse_id FROM goods_details AS gds LEFT JOIN goods AS gd ON (gds.goods_id = gd.goods_id) WHERE gds.goods_id = #{goodsId} ORDER BY gd.create_time DESC

select gd.delivery_number,gd.zip_code,gd.bag_id,gd.is_special_goods,gds.gd_id,gds.goods_id,gds.actual_long, gds.actual_width,gds.actual_height,gds.actual_weight,gds.ship_address,gds.ship_contact,gds.ship_contact_mobile, gds.receipt_address,gds.receipt_contact,gds.receipt_contact_mobile from goods_details gds left join goods gd on (gds.goods_id = gd.goods_id) where gd.bag_id =#{bagId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT gd.goods_id,gd.`from`,gd.delivery_number,gd.tripartite_number,gd.good_type,gd.zip_code,gd.is_special_goods, gd.exit_way,gds.tripartite_long,gds.tripartite_width,gds.tripartite_height,gds.tripartite_weight,gds.ship_address, gds.ship_contact,gds.ship_contact_mobile,gds.receipt_address,gds.receipt_contact,gds.receipt_contact_mobile, gds.gd_id,singapore_area_id,rally_point_id,gds.app_user_id FROM goods_details AS gds LEFT JOIN goods AS gd ON (gd.goods_id =gds.goods_id) WHERE gd.tripartite_number = #{tripartiteNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT gds.goods_id,gds.actual_long,gds.actual_width,gds.actual_height,gds.actual_weight,gds.receipt_address, gds.receipt_contact,gds.receipt_contact_mobile,gds.category,gd.delivery_number,gd.good_type,gd.zip_code, gd.is_special_goods,gds.is_arrival_pay,gds.gst_price,gds.item_value,total_goods,gd.warehouse_id FROM goods_details AS gds LEFT JOIN goods AS gd ON (gd.goods_id = gds.goods_id) WHERE gd.is_print = 1 ORDER BY gd.add_time ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT app_user_id from goods_details where goods_id =#{goodsId}

SELECT gd.goods_id,gd.`from`,gd.delivery_number,gd.tripartite_number,gd.good_type,gd.zip_code,gd.is_special_goods, gd.exit_way,gds.tripartite_long,gds.tripartite_width,gds.tripartite_height,gds.tripartite_weight,gds.ship_address, gds.ship_contact,gds.ship_contact_mobile,gds.receipt_address,gds.receipt_contact,gds.receipt_contact_mobile, gds.gd_id,singapore_area_id,rally_point_id,gds.app_user_id,gd.total_goods FROM goods_details AS gds LEFT JOIN goods AS gd ON (gd.goods_id =gds.goods_id) WHERE gd.tripartite_number = #{tripartiteNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update goods_details set actual_long = #{actualLong,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_width = #{actualWidth,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_height = #{actualHeight,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_weight = #{actualWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where gd_id = #{gdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goods_details set actual_long = #{actualLong,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_width = #{actualWidth,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_height = #{actualHeight,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_weight = #{actualWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, ship_address = #{shipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ship_contact = #{shipContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ship_contact_mobile = #{shipContactMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_address = #{receiptAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_contact = #{receiptContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_contact_mobile = #{receiptContactMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, warning_state = #{warningState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, abnormal_text = #{abnormalText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, admin_uid = #{adminUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, app_user_id = #{appUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_urgent = #{isUrgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_value = #{itemValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, singapore_area_id = #{singaporeAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rally_point_id = #{rallyPointId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where gd_id = #{gdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goods_details set goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tripartite_long = #{tripartiteLong,jdbcType=REAL}, tripartite_width = #{tripartiteWidth,jdbcType=REAL}, tripartite_height = #{tripartiteHeight,jdbcType=REAL}, tripartite_weight = #{tripartiteWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_long = #{actualLong,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_width = #{actualWidth,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_height = #{actualHeight,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_weight = #{actualWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, ship_address = #{shipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ship_contact = #{shipContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ship_contact_mobile = #{shipContactMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_address = #{receiptAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_contact = #{receiptContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_contact_mobile = #{receiptContactMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipper = #{shipper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, warning_state = #{warningState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, abnormal_text = #{abnormalText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, admin_uid = #{adminUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, app_user_id = #{appUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, good_state = #{goodState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_status = #{paymentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_urgent = #{isUrgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_way = #{payWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_explain = #{itemExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_value = #{itemValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, singapore_area_id = #{singaporeAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rally_point_id = #{rallyPointId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gst_price = #{gstPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_arrival_pay = #{isArrivalPay,jdbcType=INTEGER} where gd_id = #{gdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goods_details set good_state = #{goodState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_receive_goods = #{isReceiveGoods,jdbcType=INTEGER}, send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, send_people = #{sendPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where gd_id = #{gdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goods_details set warning_state = #{warningState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, abnormal_text = #{abnormalText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_receive_goods = #{isReceiveGoods,jdbcType=INTEGER}, send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, send_people = #{sendPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where gd_id = #{gdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT gd.delivery_number,gd.good_type,gd.zip_code,gds.receipt_address, gds.receipt_contact,gds.receipt_contact_mobile FROM goods_details AS gds LEFT JOIN goods AS gd ON (gd.goods_id =gds.goods_id) WHERE gds.goods_id = #{goodsId}

SELECT gds.gd_id,gds.goods_id,gd.`status`,gd.from,gd.delivery_number,gd.tripartite_number,gd.good_type,gd.is_special_goods,gd.zip_code,gds.actual_long, gds.actual_width,gds.actual_height,gds.actual_weight,gds.ship_address,gds.ship_contact,gds.ship_contact_mobile,gd.exit_way,gds.warning_state, gds.receipt_address,gds.receipt_contact,gds.receipt_contact_mobile,gds.warning_state, gds.abnormal_text,wh.warehouse_name AS into_wh,wh2.warehouse_name AS out_wh, wp.wp_number AS into_wp,wp2.wp_number AS out_wp,gw.deal_comment,gw.warning_type,gds.app_user_id,gds.good_state,gds.payment_status,bag.bag_number, gds.singapore_area_id,gds.rally_point_id,gds.category,gds.app_user_id FROM goods_details AS gds LEFT JOIN goods AS gd ON (gd.goods_id =gds.goods_id) LEFT JOIN warehouse_positions AS wp ON (gd.into_warehouse_positions_id=wp.wp_id) LEFT JOIN warehouse_positions AS wp2 ON(gd.out_warehouse_positions_id=wp2.wp_id) LEFT JOIN warehouse AS wh ON (into_warehouse_id=wh.warehouse_id) LEFT JOIN warehouse AS wh2 ON (out_warehouse_id=wh2.warehouse_id) LEFT JOIN goods_warning AS gw ON (gds.goods_id = gw.goods_id) LEFT JOIN bag ON (gd.bag_id = bag.bag_id) WHERE bag.bag_number = #{bagNumber}
mapper.update: update goods_details set goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tripartite_long = #{tripartiteLong,jdbcType=REAL}, tripartite_width = #{tripartiteWidth,jdbcType=REAL}, tripartite_height = #{tripartiteHeight,jdbcType=REAL}, tripartite_weight = #{tripartiteWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_long = #{actualLong,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_width = #{actualWidth,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_height = #{actualHeight,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_weight = #{actualWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, ship_address = #{shipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ship_contact = #{shipContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ship_contact_mobile = #{shipContactMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_address = #{receiptAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_contact = #{receiptContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_contact_mobile = #{receiptContactMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipper = #{shipper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, warning_state = #{warningState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, abnormal_text = #{abnormalText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, admin_uid = #{adminUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, app_user_id = #{appUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, good_state = #{goodState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_status = #{paymentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_urgent = #{isUrgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_way = #{payWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_explain = #{itemExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_value = #{itemValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, singapore_area_id = #{singaporeAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rally_point_id = #{rallyPointId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where gd_id = #{gdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select gd_id, gd.from,gds.goods_id,gd.delivery_number,gd.tripartite_number,gds.item_value,gd.total_goods, gds.is_receive_goods,gds.gst_price,gds.is_arrival_pay,gd.status from goods_details AS gds LEFT JOIN goods AS gd ON (gds.goods_id=gd.goods_id) WHERE gd.tripartite_number = #{tripartiteNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT gds.gd_id,gds.goods_id,gd.`status`,gd.from,gd.delivery_number,gd.tripartite_number,gd.good_type, gd.is_special_goods,gd.zip_code,gds.receipt_address,gds.receipt_contact,gds.receipt_contact_mobile FROM goods_details AS gds LEFT JOIN goods AS gd ON (gd.goods_id =gds.goods_id) WHERE gd.bag_id = #{bagId}
mapper.update: update goods_details set goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tripartite_long = #{tripartiteLong,jdbcType=REAL}, tripartite_width = #{tripartiteWidth,jdbcType=REAL}, tripartite_height = #{tripartiteHeight,jdbcType=REAL}, tripartite_weight = #{tripartiteWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_long = #{actualLong,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_width = #{actualWidth,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_height = #{actualHeight,jdbcType=REAL}, actual_weight = #{actualWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, ship_address = #{shipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ship_contact = #{shipContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ship_contact_mobile = #{shipContactMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_address = #{receiptAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_contact = #{receiptContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_contact_mobile = #{receiptContactMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipper = #{shipper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, warning_state = #{warningState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, abnormal_text = #{abnormalText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, admin_uid = #{adminUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, app_user_id = #{appUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, good_state = #{goodState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_status = #{paymentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_urgent = #{isUrgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_way = #{payWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_explain = #{itemExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_value = #{itemValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, singapore_area_id = #{singaporeAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rally_point_id = #{rallyPointId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_arrival_pay = #{isArrivalPay,jdbcType=INTEGER} where gd_id = #{gdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
